name: HalfPintHeroes
description:
Developer: Daniel Hayward

Design: Jacob Farmer

Art: SomeFarang - SomeFarang - itch.io

Audio: Dekkanoid

This week's theme was Alternate perspectives.

The name of our game is HalfPintHeroes

AD to move left and right.

Space to jump.

WS to move the homing arrow, climb ropes.

QE to switch characters

Left Click : 

Archer - Arrow

Giant - Punch

Ninja - Shuriken

Right Click:

Archer- Controlled Arrow

Giant - Block Push

Ninja - Dash
